site_title: Baby Dinosaur by Michael G. LaFosse

block_list.title: Video Tutorial
block_list.body: This cute little Origami Baby Dinosaur is designed by Michael G. LaFosse. The Origami Baby Dino is one of a kind in terms of the way it is folded. It somewhat resembles a raptor. It is the perfect addition to your origami Jurassic Park collection. Enjoy! Thanks for watching! Wilson Lee@Heap Art
